sentences.en: Amis tells the story in reverse, from the moment the man dies.
sentences.cn: 埃米斯以倒叙的方式讲述了这个故事，从这个男人死去的时候开始讲起。

sentences.en: Can anything be done to reverse this trend?
sentences.cn: 有什么办法扭转这种倾向 吗 ?

sentences.en: Cheques should be made payable to Country Living and your address written on the reverse.
sentences.cn: 支票抬头必须写“《乡村生活》杂志”，你的地址应写在背面。

sentences.en: He expressed great regret and said that surgeons would attempt to reverse the operation.
sentences.cn: 他深表歉意，说外科医生会努力消除手术造成的损伤。

sentences.en: he put the Cadillac into reverse.
sentences.cn: 他把卡迪拉克车后倒。

sentences.en: His answer was just the reverse of what I expected.
sentences.cn: 他的回答正好与我期望的相反.

sentences.en: I owe you nothing. If anything, the reverse is true (= you owe me ) .
sentences.cn: 我不欠你什么。 如果说欠的话，是你欠我才对。

sentences.en: Please read the names on this list in reverse order.
sentences.cn: 请看看这张单子上的名字,先从末尾看起.

sentences.en: Please reverse the positions of two pictures.
sentences.cn: 请把两张图片的位置倒转过来.

sentences.en: Please write down your name on the reverse side of the envelope.
sentences.cn: 请在信封的背面写下你的名字.

sentences.en: Reverse the paper in the printer.
sentences.cn: 把打印机中的纸翻过来。

sentences.en: Suddenly, he reversed himself completely.
sentences.cn: 突然，他彻底改变了立场。

sentences.en: The army sustained a reverse.
sentences.cn: 这支军队打了败仗.

sentences.en: The British ten-pence coin has a lion on the reverse.
sentences.cn: 英国十便士硬币的背面图案是一头狮子。

sentences.en: The coin has a crowned lion on its reverse.
sentences.cn: 这枚硬币反面的图案是个戴皇冠的狮子.

sentences.en: The company had to do something to reverse its sliding fortunes.
sentences.cn: 这个公司不得不采取一些措施扭转下滑的运势。

sentences.en: The downward trend went into reverse and the scores started to creep up again.
sentences.cn: 比分下降的趋势发生逆转，分数又开始逐渐上升了。

sentences.en: The people have asserted their power and that will be very difficult to reverse.
sentences.cn: 人民已经维护了其当家作主的权力，这将难以改变。

sentences.en: The results were read out in reverse order (= with the worst first and the best last ) .
sentences.cn: 成绩是按逆序宣读的。

sentences.en: The wrong attitude will have exactly the reverse effect.
sentences.cn: 错误的态度会产生完全相反的效果。

sentences.en: to reverse a procedure/process/trend
sentences.cn: 彻底改变程序 / 过程 / 趋势

sentences.en: We should see the reverse as well as the obverse of things.
sentences.cn: 我们不但应该看到事物的正面,也要看到事物的反面.

sentences.en: You should reverse the order of these pages.
sentences.cn: 你该把这几页的顺序颠倒过来。

words.tran_cn: 颠倒的；相反的；（判决等）撤销的
可逆的；可撤消的；可反转的
倒退的；复归的；应继承的；将来应享有的
逆转；[摄] 反转；[法] 撤销
[数] 可逆性；可撤销；可反转性
逆转；回复；归还；[遗] 隔代遗传；[法] 继承权
颠倒（reverse的过去式和过去分词）；翻转

phrases.tran_cn: adv. 相反，向相反方向，倒（退），逆（行、转等）
反峰电压；反向峰值电压
向相反方向运动：在相反的方向转动或推进
枪口朝下（枪把朝上，尤用作军葬或国葬的操枪动作）
反向工程，还原工程；逆向工程
反向抵押贷款；反向抵押；反向贷款；倒按揭

trans.tran_en: Reverse means opposite from what you expect or to what has just been described.
the exact opposite of what has just been mentioned

trans.tran_cn: 反面的，颠倒的，倒开的，[生]倒卷的
倒转，反向，[机]回动，倒退，失败
trans.tran_en: the exact opposite of what has just been mentioned
if a vehicle or its driver reverses, they go backwards
if a vehicle or its driver reverses, they go backwards
if a vehicle or its driver reverses, they go backwards

trans.tran_cn: 撤销，推翻；使位置颠倒，使互换位置；使反向，使倒转
trans.tran_en: if a vehicle or its driver reverses, they go backwards

trans.tran_cn: （使）反转，（使）颠倒，调换，交换，[法]撤消，推翻
